name: Corner Store Chaos
description:
This game was made for the Brackeyes 2021.2 Jam and in it you fight your way through a store to get all the things you need and get out.

Some notes:

-Space bar also allows you to grab and release your cart as well as its other functions.

-Alt-f4 to exit because I forgot to add that button.

-There is no music or sounds because I ran out of time.

-Expect minor bugs.
